title: Amazon Product Reviewer/Buyer Admin - FOR OA
job_overview:
We are seeking an experienced Amazon Admin Virtual Assistant to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for  reviewing leads, and providing feedback to sourcers to perform better.

This is a full-time job.
Schedule will be 10am - 6pm EST.

Key Responsibilities:
- Review OA leads daily and make recommendations to buy.
- Review leads and provide feedback to sourcing VAs.

Your entire job? Review products at a HIGH level, buy inventory, and suggest replens. This job is high importance. Because of this, starting pay is $5 per hour, upwards to $7-10 per hour long term.

Requirements:
Must have previous Amazon OA sourcing experience (not dropshipping experience).
Must have high command of the English language, both in speaking and writing.
Strong understanding of Amazon's marketplace and order management.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks efficiently.

The rate is fixed. If the rate does not align with your career goals, please do not apply.

This is your first test. If you actually read the job description, put "#15" in the title of your application. As your second test, please record a LOOM VIDEO of yourself telling me about your previous Amazon Admin experience.
